name: The Three Of The Ave Maria
name_original: The Three Of The Ave Maria
description:
In this game you can live an adventure with

A main story

This is a fantasy world where there is no religion. But a religion is born, the protagonists, 3 soldiers, will have to investigate about new religion.

Side quests

There are some small adventures with rewards.

Mythology of the world

You will get to know the mythology of the world. You can observe the places or talk to people to learn about the history. You can know present, past, and also in the subjunctive!

Fight against over 200 unique creatures.

Sometimes the game freezes deliberately, don't worry there is the autosave feature.
